channel.title: Ftp..?
channel.description:
I'm going to make my own FTP server to share movies and other crap, so i was hoping that someone could tell me any good programs to manage my FTP, how to keep my FTP safe (only share the files i want to share), and other things like that :D
I havent made it yet but i found a program called CuteFTP, this is my first time making one, and yes i have searched but i would rather find out others peoples opinion on good software.
One more question the FTP will use my ip address right, is there any risk in that?
Thank You
ChArMz[br][size=1]Posted at: July 31, 2006, 05:12:01 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know how to set a ftp up, or have a tut?
